title: John Bell (by 1514 – 1543 or later)
text:
John Bell II (by 1514 – 1543 or later), of Winchelsea, Sussex, was an English politician.
A wood exporter and privateer, he was made <a href="Mayor%20of%20Winchelsea">Mayor of Winchelsea</a> for 1535–36 and 1541–42. He was then elected a <a href="Member%20of%20Parliament">Member of Parliament</a> (MP) for <a href="Winchelsea%20%28UK%20Parliament%20constituency%29">Winchelsea</a> in 1542.
